deck: Batman prepares for a final showdown against Deathstroke, Katana recruits previous allies for help, and Two-Face attempts to kill Anarky.
name: Alone

description: On the outskirts of Charleston, just steps away from perceived safety, The Mason Clan and the remaining 2nd Mass suddenly find themselves under brutal attack by a new Espheni war machine Ã‚ and a new, deadly creation unlike anything previously encountered. Divided like chattel and spread to the winds, The Masons must each forge new relationships and abilities to survive. Treva Etienne guest-stars.
name: Ghost In the Machine

description: The Espheni reveal their new plan to Tom, and he is faced with an impossible decision. Meanwhile, Weaver and Pope investigate a way out of the Espheni prison, while Matt struggles to hide his true allegiance from the "Team Leaders" at the Espheni Youth Camp. Elsewhere, Anne leads an exhausting search for her daughter Lexi, while Ben's concerns about Lexi's increasing powers uncovers a devastating secret she's been keeping. Treva Etienne and Robert Sean Leonard guest-star.
name: The Eye

description: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly. At the Espheni Youth Camp, Matt tries to talk Mira out of a dangerous escape plan. While trekking through the woods with her guerilla fighters, Anne has a flashback to her time in the Espheni Tower with Karen (guest star Jessy Schram), where a terrifying secret about Lexi is revealed. Treva Etienne guest-stars.
name: Exodus

description: After breaking out of the Espheni Ghetto, Tom and the 2nd Mass seek refuge in a Volm hideout, where tensions run high between the Volm and humans. Tom sets off with Weaver and Cochise to find Matt, leaving Hal in charge. Meanwhile in Chinatown, Anne is reunited with Lexi, and comes to realize that the little girl she saw 6 months ago is now a grown woman. Mira Sorvino and Treva Etienne guest-star.
name: Evolve or Die

description: After freeing Matt from the Espheni Youth Camp, Tom encounters two mysterious strangers in the woods, who attack his family before embarking with him on a violent journey. Hal faces almost insurmountable odds as he tries to lead the remaining Volm and 2nd Mass to a place of perceived safety. Lexi and Anne have a difference of opinions -- resulting in dangerous consequences. Mira Sorvino, Treva Etienne and Robert Sean Leonard guest-star.
name: Mind Wars

description: After months apart, Tom finally reunites with his family and the 2nd Mass. But the joyous reunion is cut short as Lexi undergoes a health crisis tied to her hybrid DNA. The crisis pits family members against one another as they fight over how to deal with Lexi's illness. Anne goes to great lengths to save her daughter. Treva Etienne, Jessy Schram and Robert Sean Leonard guest-star.
name: Door Number Three

description: Lexi emerges more powerful and ruthless than ever. Tom and the 2nd Mass must work together with the Volm to hold off the invading Espheni forces in what becomes the bloodiest battle of the series. Mira Sorvino, Treva Etienne and Robert Sean Leonard guest-star.
name: Saturday Night Massacre

description: The 2nd Mass picks up the pieces after a devastating alien attack leaves Maggie fighting for her life...and Hal fighting for Maggie. Meanwhile, Tom and Dingaan (guest star Treva Etienne) are cut off from the rest of the group, buried under tons of rubble, where they must rely on an Enemy Ship to rescue them. Mira Sorvino guest-stars.
name: A Thing With Feathers

description: With Ba Sing Se in chaos, Mako and Bolin acquire an airship and set course for the Si Wong Desert to find Korra and Asami. They eventually track their friends down to the Misty Palms Oasis, where they reunite and relay Zaheer's message: Korra in exchange for the survival of the Air Nation. Team Avatar heads back to Zaofu to use their radio transmitter and prepare for takeoff toward the temple. The warning comes too late, however, and the Red Lotus manages to capture all the temple's inhabitants. Tenzin, Kya, and Bumi try to fight off Zaheer, Ming-Hua, and Ghazan, but are eventually overpowered. Although Kai nearly sacrifices himself to help the airbenders reach the bison stables and escape, P'Li manages to recapture the Air Acolytes.
name: The Ultimatum

deck: An eclipse causes things in NYC to escalate quickly.
description: After warning Kelly to leave the city with Zack ahead of the spreading plague, Eph is arrested by the FBI. Eichhorst has one final job for Gus, while Setrakian realizes that the coming eclipse is the tipping point for virus infection and the beginning of the end.
name: Occultation

deck: An assassin targets Scott and Liam at the lacrosse team's annual bonfire. Lydia uncovers a family secret. The Benefactor's identity is revealed.
name: Perishable

deck: After receiving a minor dose of radiation poisoning, O'Brien inexplicably begins experiencing a series of jumps into the near future. Meanwhile, a Romulan delegation arrives on the station, expecting an intelligence report on the Dominion
name: Visionary

deck: After an alien assault leaves Bashir unconscious, he is trapped inside his mind.
name: Distant Voices

deck: In the "mirror universe," Sisko must persuade the alternate version of his dead wife to join the Terran Rebels, or he will watch her die a second time.
description: This was the second DS9 that featured the mirror universe visited in Mirror Mirror in the Original Series. The other DS9 episode that featured the mirror universe was the 2nd season episode 'Crossover'.
name: Through the Looking Glass

description: Starfire is tired of not fitting in with the other Titans, and asks Raven to help her to learn more about human culture. Raven casts a spell to give Starfire all of human knowledge, which turns Starfire into the total bummer.
name: Knowledge

description: When the Titans find out that Cyborg is afraid of the dark, they have a slumber party to help him face his fears.
name: Slumber Party
X Games: First Class; Criminal Minecraft
TransBOREmores 3: Dark of the Blue Moon; The Walking Fred
Kitchen Nightmares Before Christmas; How I Met Your Mummy

description: The newly regenerated Doctor has to deal with a dinosaur in London and the possible return of a old enemy. But how will Clara and Paternoster Gang (Jenny, Vastra and Strax) deal with this new, possibly mentally unstable, Doctor?
name: Deep Breath

description: Korra must turn herself over to Zaheer to save the airbenders. But she and her friends are double-crossed by Zaheer. On the ropes Boling, Mako and Asami battle Ming Hua and Ghazan, who tries to bring the temple down on top of them. Bolin saves the day with his new-found lavabending abilities. Zaheer also discovers a new skill, unlocking the ancient ability of flight and successfully capturing the Avatar.
name: Enter the Void

description: After succumbing to the poison, Korra enters the Avatar State and battles Zaheer. Bolin and Mako duel Ghazan and Ming-Hua. The Metal Clan manage to free the Air Nomads who join the fight in stopping Zaheer. Due to the poison being in her system for so long leaves Korra wheelchair bound for the time being. Jinora is anointed as an airbending master by Tenzin. The Air Nation will return to its nomadic roots and serve as the world's ambassadors for peace and balance.
name: Venom of the Red Lotus

description: Setrakian, Eph, and Nora formulate a plan to track down the Master using Jim as bait. Eichhorst and Setrakianâ€™s pasts are revealed. At the Luss home, Neeva struggles to protect the children while encountering a mysterious stranger whose help she may not want.
name: For Services Rendered

has_staff_review.name: The Strain Episode 107: For Services Rendered

deck: Scott and Kira protect the remnants of Satomi's pack while Malia and Stiles team up to uncover the origins of the Dead Pool.
name: Monstrous

deck: The Cardassian-Romulan fleet enters the Gamma Quadrant; Sisko tries to rescue Odo. (Part 2 of 2)
name: The Die is Cast

deck: Odo begins an investigation after a bomb destroys Garak's tailor shop. (Part 1 of 2)
name: Improbable Cause
Dig That Catâ€¦ He's Real Gone

description: The Doctor and Clara are confronted with the possibility of a good Dalek, but is it true? And if so they must go into the Dalek!
name: Into the Dalek

description: After discovering the potency of ultraviolet light against the strigoi, Setrakian gains a new and unlikely disciple. A quick trip to a Brooklyn convenience store turns into a deadly all-night siege.
name: Creatures of the Night

has_staff_review.name: The Strain Episode 108: "Creatures of the Night"

deck: A battles against an old enemy.
name: A Promise to the Dead

deck: The Doctor and Co. head to revolutionary France.
description:
Episodes 4-5 are missing but have been released as animated episodes. These episdes retain there original audio tracks.

Writer: Denis Spooner

Director: Henric Hirsch

Episode 1: A Land of Fear

Episode 2: Guests of Madame Guillotine

Episode 3: A Change of Identity

Episode 4: The Tyrant of France

Episode 5: A Bargain of Necessity

Episode 6: Prisoners of Conciergerie

Synopsis

The TARDIS materialises not far from Paris in 1794 â€” one of the bloodiest years following the French Revolution of 1789. The travelers become involved with an escape chain rescuing prisoners from the guillotine and get caught up in the machinations of an English undercover spy, James Stirling â€” alias Lemaitre, governor of the Conciergerie prison.
name: The Reign of Terror

deck: The Doctor and his companions are shrinked!
description:
Was filmed as a 4 parter but was only aired as 3

Writer: Louis Marks

Director: Mervyn Pinfield and Douglas Camfield

Episode 1: Planet of Giants

Episode 2: Dangerous Journey

Episode 3: Crisis
name: Planet of Giants

description:
2nd appearance of the Daleks (also serves as the basis for the 2nd Doctor Who movie starring Peter Cushing)

Writer: Terry Nation (who wrote most Daleks stories of the original series)

Director: Richard Martin

Episode 1: World's End

Episode 2: The Daleks

Episode 3: Day of Reckoning

Episode 4: The End of Tomorrow

Episode 5: The Waking Ally

Episode 6: Flashpoint

Synopsis

The TARDIS returns to London; however it's the 22nd century. With bodies in the river, and quiet in the docklands, the city is a very different place. The Daleks have invaded and it's up to the Doctor to thwart them once again...
name: The Dalek Invasion of Earth

deck: Who else is on the ship?
description:
Writer: David Whitaker

Director: Christopher Barry

Episode 1: The Powerful Enemy

Episode 2: Desperate Measures
name: The Rescue

description: A prank by Mera and Aqualad that goes wrong winds up helping them defeat an attack by cyclopsian beings
name: The Stickmen of Stygia

description: Aquaman and Aqualad must stop Black Manta's attempt to sink a mid-ocean luxury liner.
name: The Menace of the Black Manta

description: A hydropower relay station for Atlantis is attacked by maniacal reptile beings.
name: The Rampaging Reptile-Men

description: A Viking sea-tyrant is revived from frozen suspension and attacks Atlantis.
name: The Return of Nepto

description: Sun beings attack Earth to dry out its oceans.
name: The Fiery Invaders

description: Alien big game hunters land in the ocean.
name: The Sea Raiders

description: Mera is captured by a brutal plant being in a watery world beneath the sea.
name: War of the Water Worlds

description: A lava giant tears open a volcano and battles the sea king.
name: The Volcanic Monster

description: A monster that spews deadly acid from its tentacles marches toward Atlantis.
name: The Crimson Monster from the Pink Pool

description: The Fisherman sets a trap for Aquaman that backfires.
name: To Catch a Fisherman

description: Written by Bob Haney.
name: In Captain Cuda's Clutches

description: A sea pirate rigs a trap at the Aquacave.
name: Where Lurks the Fisherman!

description: Torpedo Man gains assistance from two other metallic beings named Magneto and Claw in a plot to destroy Aquaman.
name: The Torp, the Magneto and the Claw

description: Black Manta, Queen Vassa, and The Brain join forces.
name: Trio of Terror

description: The Torpedo Man, an armored being that can swim at super speed, lures the Aqua team to an unstable pirate wreck.
name: Treacherous is the Torpedoman

description:
The Doctor takes Clara to meet her childhood hero - Robin Hood. But he doesn't exist right?

The Doctor has to overcome his skepticism's to fight off a deadly alien threat but can Robin be trusted.
name: Robot of Sherwood

description: Raven warns the other Titans not to go near a box containing the Twin Destroyers of Azarath. Starfire can't help it and opens the box, giving hugs and snuggles to the two tiny, adorable Destroyers... but love only makes the Destroyers stronger.
name: Love Monsters

description: While members of the 2nd Mass attempt to dig out a shot-down Beamer, Tom and a small team follow the Volm to a supply cache in search of equipment to expedite the process. Along the way, they encounter a friend, and must decide whether or not to trust her. Back at camp, Maggie and Ben grow closer as he teaches her to hone her new skills, while Pope and Sara (guest star Mira Sorvino) continue to clash, resulting in a fight from which they may never recover. Treva Etienne guest-stars.
name: Til Death Do Us Part

description: Tom and the remnants of the 2nd Mass learn to pilot a Beamer as part of their plan to destroy the Espheni Power Core, and the group draws straws to see who will embark on the dangerous mission. The threat of death hanging over everyone triggers long-simmering confrontations between many of our main characters, ultimately bringing the 2nd Mass closer together. Treva Etienne guest-stars.
name: Drawing Straws

description: Tom's mission to destroy the Espheni Power Core is complicated by Lexi's return. Lexi is forced to take extreme measures to save her father's life -- and her own -- after a Beamer malfunction. Meanwhile, the 2nd Mass fears an impending Espheni strike by the scorched Overlord. Treva Etienne guest-stars.
name: Space Oddity

description: With the weight of humanity's survival on Tom and Lexi's shoulders, they must defeat Tom's mortal enemy and find a way to destroy the omnipotent Espheni Power Core. Meanwhile, a new, terrifying Espheni Bomb is dropped onto Chinatown, immobilizing the 2nd Mass and preparing them for Human Skitterizaton. Mira Sorvino and Treva Etienne guest-star.
name: Shoot the Moon

description: Exhausted from her recent travails, Sookie finds herself the unwilling host of a festive mainstreaming party in Bon Temps. In search of an elusive adversary, Eric and Pam head to Dallas and attend a gala fundraiser. Andy makes a life-changing decision; Jessica and James reach a crossroads; Bill loses himself in remembrance of human days.
name: Lost Cause

description: A shocking discovery forces Sookie to reassess her recent involvement with Bill. In Dallas, Eric and Pam forge an unlikely alliance in their hunt for a shared nemesis. Andy bickers with Holly about their children's behavior; Lafayette shares a vision with Lettie Mae; Jason owns up to his true feelings about Violet; Sam finds himself in a quandary regarding Nicole.
name: Karma

description: Eric, Pam and Mr. Gus close in on Sarah in Dallas. Adilyn and Wade find a temporary haven, and unexpected hospitality. Refusing to accept the inevitable, a desperate Sookie turns to the witch doctor Dr. Ludwig for information about her bloodline, and summons her faerie grandfather, Niall, in search of a miracle. Bill recalls the inexorable forces that led him to his marriage.
name: May Be the Last Time

description: With his prey in sight, Eric reconsiders his end-game strategies against Sarah. Sookie puts her life at risk in hopes of saving Bill. Lettie Mae and Lafayette urge Reverend Daniels to join them in their V-fueled search for Tara. Violet eyes payback against those who betrayed her, while Hoyt falls in love for the first time, again.
name: Almost Home

description: Sookie retreats in the wake of an inexplicable decision. Sam puts his future ahead of his past. Hoyt is reminded of the past, while Jason exercises uncharacteristic restraint. Ginger's wish finally comes true. Eric faces a dilemma after being caught in a lie.
name: Love Is To Die

description: Series Finale. Sookie weighs a future with and without Bill. Eric and Pam embark on a new enterprise, while Sarah faces the consequences of her actions.Sam embraces his new life; Andy comes upon an unexpected inheritance.
name: Thank You
